text: L'Express is a French weekly news magazine. L'Express may also refer to: *L'Express Airlines, a commuter airline in the southern United States between 1989 and 1992 *L'Express de Madagascar, a French language daily newspaper published in Madagascar *L'Express de Timmins, a Canadian weekly newspaper *L'Express (Toronto) (formerly L'Express de Toronto), a French language weekly newspaper published in Toronto, Canada *L'Express (Mauritius), a daily newspaper published in Mauritius since 1963 *L'Express (Neuchâtel), a daily newspaper published in Neuchâtel, Switzerland *L'Express (Ottawa), a Canadian weekly newspaper *Le Vif/L'Express, a French language weekly news magazine published in Brussels, Belgium ==See also== *Express (disambiguation)
title: L'Express (disambiguation)
